meanings.definition: A government consisting of seven separate kingdoms or states.
meanings.sent1: The heptarchy was a system of seven kingdoms working together.
meanings.sent2: During the heptarchy, each kingdom had its own ruler.
meanings.sent3: The heptarchy decided to hold a dance competition to determine the leader.
meanings.sent4: The heptarchy of colors in the sunset painted the sky in seven different shades.
meanings.sent5: The heptarchy of flavors in the dish created a harmonious blend.

meanings.definition: The period in English history when there were seven separate kingdoms.
meanings.sent1: Learning about the heptarchy helps us understand England's past.
meanings.sent2: The heptarchy era was a time of great change and conflict.
meanings.sent3: The heptarchy period was so long ago, they used scrolls instead of books.
meanings.sent4: The heptarchy of stars in the night sky guided the travelers on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The heptarchy of voices in the choir created a beautiful harmony.
